languages.text: Яростный Космический волк Ульфар уничтожил любую возможность мирных переговоров с собравшимися друкари. Остается лишь один путь — путь войны.
Ulfar, the ferocious Space Wolf, has destroyed any possibility of parleying with the Drukhari. There is only one way out now — the way of carnage and war.
languages.original_text: Яростный Космический волк Ульфар уничтожил любую возможность мирных переговоров с собравшимися друкари. Остается лишь один путь — путь войны.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar, the ferocious Space Wolf, has decimated any possibility of parleying with the Drukhari. There's only one way out now — the way of carnage and war.
Ulfar, the ferocious Space Wolf, has destroyed any possibility of parleying with the Drukhari. There is only one way out now — the way of carnage and war.
Ulfar, the ferocious Space Wolf, has destroyed any possibility of parleying with the Drukhari. There is only one way out now — the way of carnage and war.

languages.text: Ulfar, le redoutable Space Wolf, a anéanti tout espoir de négocier avec les Drukharis. Il n'y a plus qu'une seule issue : celle du carnage et de la guerre.
languages.original_text: Ulfar, the ferocious Space Wolf, has destroyed any possibility of parleying with the Drukhari. There is only one way out now — the way of carnage and war.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar, le redoutable Space Wolf, a anéanti tout espoir de négocier avec les Drukharis. Il n'y a plus qu'une seule issue : celle du carnage et de la guerre.

languages.text: 凶狠的太空野狼乌尔法已经彻底摧毁了与黑暗灵族谈判的可能性。如今只有一条出路，那便是鲜血与屠杀的战争之路。
languages.original_text: Ulfar, the ferocious Space Wolf, has destroyed any possibility of parleying with the Drukhari. There is only one way out now — the way of carnage and war.

traits.locale_text: 凶狠的太空野狼乌尔法已经彻底摧毁了与黑暗灵族谈判的可能性。如今只有一条出路，那便是鲜血与屠杀的战争之路。

languages.text: 獰猛なスペースウルフ・ウルファーは、デュカーリとの交渉の可能性を無に帰した。今残された道はただ一つ、殺戮と戦争だ。
languages.original_text: Ulfar, the ferocious Space Wolf, has destroyed any possibility of parleying with the Drukhari. There is only one way out now — the way of carnage and war.

traits.locale_text: 獰猛なスペースウルフ・ウルファーは、デュカーリとの交渉の可能性を無に帰した。今残された道はただ一つ、殺戮と戦争だ。

languages.text: Ulfar, der wilde Space Wolf, hat jede Möglichkeit zerstört, mit den Drukhari zu verhandeln. Jetzt gibt es nur noch einen Ausweg — den Weg von Blut und Krieg.
languages.original_text: Ulfar, the ferocious Space Wolf, has destroyed any possibility of parleying with the Drukhari. There is only one way out now — the way of carnage and war.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar, der wilde Space Wolf, hat jede Möglichkeit zerstört, mit den Drukhari zu verhandeln. Jetzt gibt es nur noch einen Ausweg — den Weg von Blut und Krieg.

languages.text: Ulfar, el feroz Lobo Espacial, ha echado por tierra cualquier ocasión de parlamentar con los Drukhari. La única opción que queda es una sangrienta guerra.
languages.original_text: Ulfar, the ferocious Space Wolf, has destroyed any possibility of parleying with the Drukhari. There is only one way out now — the way of carnage and war.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar, el feroz Lobo Espacial, ha echado por tierra cualquier ocasión de parlamentar con los Drukhari. La única opción que queda es una sangrienta guerra.

languages.text: Vahşi Uzay Kurdu Ulfar, Drukharilerle tüm görüşme fırsatlarını ortadan kaldırdı. Şimdi buradan kurtulmanın tek bir yolu var: Katliam ve savaş.
languages.original_text: Ulfar, the ferocious Space Wolf, has destroyed any possibility of parleying with the Drukhari. There is only one way out now — the way of carnage and war.
